Make sure that the following four :

1. Both running Monitor Mode device and Camera Mode device need to connect under the same WIFI AP or WIFI router.

 2. WIFI Router built-in firewall or WIFI AP built-in firewall does not blocks the video stream signal from Camera Mode device, if it so, firewall needs to be closed.

 3. Anti-virus software installed in both devices does not blocks the video stream signal from Camera Mode device, if it so, need to do some additional setting or just turn off/stop the anti-virus software.

 4. Android 4.0 or later is required to run Camera Mode.
If the above matters are confirmed but both devices are still unable to create the connection, please try the following :
1. Reboot the Camera Mode device.\n 2. Reboot the Monitor Mode device.\n 3. Reboot the WIFI router or AP.
If it still can not be performed after the completion of the above, please contact to the author and describe the situation that you are experiencing.
